Articles.Content: Is there a trick to making (small) spherical objects out of structural panels? (I'm attempting to make a aesthetically accurate Soyuz spacecraft, using the Mk1-2 Command Pod, and the orbital module still needs to be worked on.)
I use the shielded docking ports. Just put them on stuts and spam them. It takes a bit of patience to get it to look perfect, though.

Rotate the parts with Shift wasd.

Normal wasd moves it 45 degrees, if you hold shift it only moves 5 degrees
